site_name: First to Fourth Floor above 66-74 Notting Hill Gate, LONDON, W11
description:
Joint Decision and Verification Order required for the street numbering and internal numbering of the re-developed residential units located at First to Fourth Floor above 66-74 Notting Hill Gate W11, with access and post point located within Pembridge Gardens W2 at rear of 72-74 Notting Hill Gate W11, linked to Planning application PP/15/05730, as follows:

Access and post point to be known as:

1A Pembridge Gardens W2

Residential units to be known as:

Apartment 1, First Floor, 1A Pembridge Gardens W2
